Definition: Given a public comment from online platforms, you are expected to classify the comment into two classes: sexual-explicit and non-sexual-explicit. A comment is considered sexual-explicit if it explicitly portrays sexual matters.

Negative Examples.input: Comment: It's horrible, isn't it?  It had blood coming out of its eyes.  Blood coming out of its wherever.  Terrible.
